revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contribs/2605:A000:1307:96A0:813A:9185:8680:9AC0|2605:A000:1307:96A0:813A:9185:8680:9AC0]] ([[User talk:2605:A000:1307:96A0:813A:9185:8680:9AC0|talk]]) to last version by Sandstein
revision.text:
<!--Note: Wikipedia is not a dictionary. Do not list meanings here, unless there is a corresponding article.--> {{wiktionary|aberration}} An '''aberration''' is something that deviates from the normal way.
'''Aberration''' may also refer to:
{{TOC right}} ==Optics and physics== *[[Optical aberration]], an imperfection in image formation by an optical system *[[Chromatic aberration]], caused by differences in refractive index for different wavelengths of light, in contrast with monochromatic aberration, which occurs for all frequencies of light *[[Spherical aberration]], which occurs when light rays pass through a spherical lens near the edge *[[Defocus aberration]], which occurs when a system is out of focus *[[Astronomical aberration]], which produces an apparent motion of celestial objects *[[Relativistic aberration]], the distortion of light at high velocities
==Biology and medicine== *[[Form (zoology)|aberratio]] or aberration, a rare (mutant) butterfly or moth wing pattern. *[[Chromosome abnormality]], or aberration, a disruption in the normal chromosomal content of a cell *[[Cardiac aberrancy]], aberration of the conduction of action potentials in the electrical conduction system of the heart
==Entertainment== *Aberration, a [[Downloadable content|DLC]] for the video game [[Ark: Survival Evolved|ARK: Survival Evolved]] *[[Aberration (film)|''Aberration'' (film)]], a horror movie *[[Aberration (EP)]]
==See also== *[[Aberrant]], a superhero roleplaying game by White Wolf Game Studio
{{disambiguation}}
